lead_paragraph: Mauricio Pochettino said his Tottenham Hotspur players must take a hard look in the mirror rather than blame unfamiliar Wembley Stadium surroundings for a second "embarrassing" home Champions League defeat on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Embarrassed Pochettino Blames Players, Not Wembley, for Loss
headline.main: Embarrassed Pochettino Blames Players, Not Wembley, for Loss

snippet: Mauricio Pochettino said his Tottenham Hotspur players must take a hard look in the mirror rather than blame unfamiliar Wembley Stadium surroundings for a second "embarrassing" home Champions League defeat on Wednesday....
